name: Special administrator; formal proceedings; power and duties
text: §560:3-617  Special administrator; formal proceedings; power and duties.  A special administrator appointed by order of the court in any formal proceeding has the power of a general personal representative except as limited in the appointment and duties as prescribed in the order.  The appointment may be for a specified time, to perform particular acts or on other terms as the court may direct. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
